sentences.en: All she did was hang around ogling the men in the factory.
sentences.cn: 她就只会在工厂里四处乱逛，朝男人抛媚眼。

sentences.en: Do ogle her. Just remember to use discretion and show proper respect.
sentences.cn: 记住你的目光中应透露出你慎重和尊敬——不行就装一下嘛.

sentences.en: Have eye contact with others but make sure you do not stare or ogle.
sentences.cn: 有目光接触其他人,但确保你不要盯或眉目传情.

sentences.en: He likes to ogle at the pretty girls.
sentences.cn: 他爱盯着漂亮的女孩子.

sentences.en: Just to watch and ogle them from the other side of the ditch.
sentences.cn: 只是为了可以在壕沟的这边眺望她们,向她们眉目传情.

sentences.en: Ogle with little horse in Seven Star Park.
sentences.cn: 与七星公园的马儿“眉目传情”.

sentences.en: Paula is not used to everyone ogling at her while she undresses backstage.
sentences.cn: 葆拉还不习惯在后台换衣服时所有人都色迷迷地盯着她看。

sentences.en: What to do? Just to watch and ogle them from the other side of the ditch.
sentences.cn: 去干 什么 ?只是为了可以在壕沟的这边眺望她们,向她们眉目传情.

sentences.en: You could install a reverse periscope in your headstone so morbid voyeurs could come ogle you.
sentences.cn: 你大可在墓穴里安装一台倒置潜望镜,变态的过路人可以饥渴地窥视你.

trans.tran_cn: 媚眼, 送秋波, 眉目传情

trans.tran_en: If you say that one person is ogling another, you disapprove of them continually staring at that person in a way that indicates a strong sexual interest
